com.smarterapp.mobilebrowser
Class ActivityWatchService

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.app.Service
              com.smarterapp.mobilebrowser.ActivityWatchService
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
public class ActivityWatchService
extends android.app.Service

This Service runs in the background while the Secure Browser is active. It performs a check at a scheduled interval to determine the secure status of the application. If it is detected that the Secure Browser is not the active foreground activity. It automatically restarts the browser, bringing it to the front of the activity stack. If a security threat is otherwise detected by the service, a local broadcast is sent to alert other components of the application to handle.
